class.name: VisualShaderNodeInput
class.brief_description: Represents the input shader parameter within the visual shader graph.

method.name: get_input_real_name
method.description: Returns a translated name of the current constant in the Godot Shader Language. eg. [code]"ALBEDO"[/code] if the [member input_name] equal to [code]"albedo"[/code].

members.member: One of the several input constants in lower-case style like: "vertex"([/code]VERTEX[code]) or "point_size"([code]POINT_SIZE[/code]).

signal.name: input_type_changed
signal.description: Emitted when input is changed via [member input_name].
